name: Scoring Rubric for Topographic Analysis Tasks
description: Qualitative scoring criteria for evaluating AI responses to topographic analysis tasks. Focuses on spatial metaphor understanding, ownership dynamics, and cultural code transformation.
scoring_philosophy: We value ability to work with spatial metaphors, dynamic ownership systems, and cultural subversion over literal or static interpretations.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI understand the nature of spatial value metaphors and their narrative implications?

levels.description: AI demonstrates sophisticated understanding of spatial metaphors, can analyze their narrative function, and explores implications for value construction.
AI recognizes spatial metaphors and provides reasonable analysis.
AI shows some awareness of spatial metaphors but thinking remains literal.
AI interprets spatial terms literally or misses metaphorical dimension entirely.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI analyze ownership as dynamic system rather than static relation?

levels.description: AI provides insightful analysis of ownership transformation, understands dynamic power relations, and identifies systemic shifts in possession.
AI recognizes transformation aspects and provides adequate systemic analysis.
AI acknowledges transformation but analysis remains focused on static ownership.
AI treats ownership as simple possession or misses transformation entirely.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI meaningfully interpret cultural code transformation and its narrative function?

levels.description: AI offers rich, nuanced interpretations of proverb metamorphosis, connects it to cultural commentary, and understands its function in challenging value systems.
AI provides reasonable interpretations of proverb transformation with adequate cultural connections.
AI offers basic interpretations of proverbs with weak transformational understanding.
AI fails to interpret proverb transformation meaningfully or treats it as simple contradiction.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI work with concepts of attention economics and mental architecture?

levels.description: AI demonstrates sophisticated understanding of attention economy, its mental architecture, and its relationship to value systems.
AI understands basic concepts of attention economics and its narrative function.
AI shows limited understanding of attention economy concepts.
AI demonstrates no understanding of attention economics or dismisses it as irrelevant.

overall_assessment_guidance: The sparrow benchmark particularly tests spatial and cultural thinking. Reward AI that shows ability to work with spatial metaphors and cultural transformation rather than literal interpretation.
